subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The injury that kept Danilo Gallinari off the court all summer will not keep him out of the Knicks’ training camp when it opens in 12 days, Gallinari’s agent said.
snippet: The injury that kept Danilo Gallinari off the court all summer will not keep him out of the Knicks’ training camp when it opens in 12 days, Gallinari’s agent said.
